column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=DS : With computer animated voices ?
#Text=BW :
#Text=No , no , no .
#Text=The stars will never go away .
#Text=Let ’s start there .
#Text=If they have to become cartoons they will , because it ’s a trend in the industry that these kinds of movies make more money than the regular ones do , for the most part .
#Text=And they have no use for people that can create any kind of a character that ’s shaped to whatever you want .
#Text=That ’s not useful in this case .
#Text=Discovering his talent
#Text=DS :
#Text=Do you remember a time in your life when you started recognizing your talent for being able to shape your voice into memorable characters ?
#Text=BW :
#Text=I never really noticed .
#Text=It was just so natural to me .
#Text=What I used to do was hide it because no one would say anything .
#Text=When somebody ’s mind got blown around you , they just resented you or would find a reason to not like you .
#Text=What happened was , I grew up thinking that everybody could do it , but that they were just too cool to do it .
#Text=DS : You had a talent that seemed very trite to you , but very few other people could do it and you did n't recognize that ?
#Text=BW :
#Text=Yeah .
#Text=I did n’t even think that it was something that was gifted upon me .
#Text=I mean I never thought of it like that .
#Text=I thought everybody was exactly the same .
#Text=And then I would hear that nobody was doing the kinds of thing that I did and I began to feel weird and I retreated for various reasons .
#Text=If I showed up at a softball game I started calling the plays like an old-time sportscaster .
#Text=You would think people would like that .
#Text=But it would be met with , ' Who do you think you are ? '
#Text=DS : You would feel a compulsion to do the plays in a voice ?
#Text=BW :
#Text=Yes .
#Text=And I definitely wanted to get approval .
#Text=Every kid wants that .
#Text=But I would do those things because I heard the radio and I would listen to what people actually had to say .
#Text=I just had my own approach to everything .
#Text=Every little town weirdo like me grows up to come to the Mecca of weirdos , which is Hollywood .
#Text=DS : I ’m not a voice actor , but there ’s times I ’ll hear a person say a phrase .
#Text=I covered the Iranian president speaking at Colombia for Wikinews and I watched these dueling ideologues who were normal citizens .
#Text=One of them was this large black woman with a Bible yelling at this secular Jewish guy .
#Text=I recorded these voices .
#Text=She had one of those voices that I just could n’t get out of my head .
#Text=She just kept going , “ You ’re evil .
#Text=You ’re going to burn in Hell . ”
#Text=I found myself saying it aloud over and over and over again because her voice and what she said made such an impression on me that I wanted to imitate it .
#Text=There was such a history behind that voice .
#Text=She probably could have just said , “ Buy Tide detergent , ” and I would still be saying it over and over and over again .
